GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article based on the id provided

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: returns the comments on an article based on the article_id supplied

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: responds with an object with a new comment and a username

comment.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Responds with an updated article based on the article_id provided

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

DELETE /api/comments/comment_id.descrition: returns an empty object when the content is deleted based on the id supplied
